answers.author: Trey Williams
answers.text:
Nancy,
Attached is a document from the City of Largo, FL outlining the impacts of proper commercial waste grease collection. The document outlines the problem and budgetary impact of grease collection (or the lack thereof) and how the city has implemented a grease management program and its impacts. I will also follow up with an award-winning program from Riverside, CA.

answers.author: Nancy Woods
answers.text:
Trey - Thank you so much for sharing your information and the quick response.  I believe the award winning Riverside program you mention is the same one I found on the Alliance website under documents (Helen Putnam Award for Excellence Grease to Gas to Power Puts Riverside on the Road to Energy Independence).   Thanks again!

author: Nancy Woods
text: The City of Tempe is seeking information regarding  the impact of proper commercial  waste  grease collection on municipal sewer operation and maintenance costs, and grease / COD loading at municipal wastewater treatment plants and/or biodiesel programs.
title: Commercial Waste Grease Collection
